onboarding.desc1: The leading trading strategy builder for all skill levels. Create, test, and deploy strategies with ease.
onboarding.desc2: Build your own trading strategies with our simple drag-and-drop interface. No coding required to create professional strategies.
onboarding.desc3: Test your strategies against historical market data to validate performance before risking real money.
onboarding.desc4: Deploy your strategies to live markets and monitor performance in real-time with detailed analytics.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to your Qompyl account

timeframe.title: Timeframe
timeframe.infoDesc: A timeframe is the duration of each candle in your chart. For example, a 5-minute timeframe means each candle represents 5 minutes of price action.
timeframe.earlyDesc: Enter trades before the official close time. Can be helpful to catch early movements but carries increased risk.
timeframe.hourDesc: Limit your trading to specific times of day. This helps you focus on the most active and profitable periods.

warning.title: Warning!
warning.description: Early trade entry is a potentially dangerous decision. Entering trades before the official close time may result in:
warning.caution: Please proceed with caution and ensure you understand the risks involved.

strategyType.tradingDesc: A strategy that aims to profit from short-term price movements. Trades can last from minutes to days.
strategyType.tradingExample: Example: Day trading using moving average crossovers on 5-minute charts
strategyType.investingDesc: A strategy focused on long-term growth. Investments can last from weeks to months or years.
strategyType.investingExample: Example: Investing based on long-term trends using weekly charts
strategyType.infoDesc: Choose between trading (short-term) or investing (long-term) based on your goals and risk tolerance.
strategyType.tradingInfo: Trading strategies are designed for short-term market movements, typically holding positions from minutes to days.
strategyType.investingInfo: Investing strategies focus on long-term growth, typically holding positions from weeks to years.

direction.longDesc: Trade expecting price to rise. You profit when the price increases.
direction.shortDesc: Trade expecting price to fall. You profit when the price decreases.

tradable.stockDesc: Securities representing ownership in a company. You can profit through company growth and dividends.
tradable.etfDesc: Investment funds that combine multiple assets. Known for diversification and low costs.
tradable.cryptoDesc: Digital assets based on blockchain technology. Known for high volatility and 24/7 trading.
tradable.forexDesc: Trading of currency pairs. You profit from exchange rate fluctuations.

exposure.title: Maximum Exposure
exposure.desc: Controls the maximum percentage or amount your strategy can invest in a single company. A simple way to manage risk and diversify investments.

popups.strategyLimitsDesc: Set additional rules for your strategy. For example, minimum cash to retain or conditions to halt trading. These help automate risk management and discipline.
popups.maxExposureDesc: Controls the maximum percentage or amount your strategy can invest in a single company. A simple way to manage risk and diversify investments.
popups.orderTypeDesc: Order type determines how your trades are executed. Market orders execute immediately at the best available price. Limit orders let you set a specific price, but may not execute if the market doesn't reach that price. Choose the type that matches your strategy and risk tolerance.
popups.riskPerTradeLabel: How much of your account do you want to risk per trade?
popups.allocationPerStockLabel: How much of your account should be allocated per qualifying stock?
popups.tradeLimitsHint: Max open trades: 1 per stock, 5 total

strategyType.title: Strategy Type Information
strategyType.description: Choose between trading (short-term) or investing (long-term) based on your goals and risk tolerance.
strategyType.tradingInfo: Trading strategies are designed for short-term market movements, typically holding positions from minutes to days.
strategyType.investingInfo: Investing strategies focus on long-term growth, typically holding positions from weeks to years.

distance.title: Trade Setup Detection Distance
distance.description: Set how far in advance you want to be notified of potential trade setups. This helps you prepare for upcoming opportunities.
distance.warning: Setting a longer distance gives you more time to prepare but may result in more false signals.
distance.header: Distance if a trade setup is detected:

account.title: Account Selection
account.description: Choose the account you want to use for this strategy. Different accounts may have different trading permissions and risk levels.
account.warning: Make sure your selected account has sufficient funds and appropriate trading permissions.

backtest.title: Backtest Your Strategy
backtest.description: Test your strategy against historical data to validate its performance before risking real money.
backtest.warning: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Always monitor your strategy's performance.

deploy.title: Deploy Strategy
deploy.description: Launch your strategy to start trading in live markets. Make sure you've completed all setup steps and reviewed your strategy thoroughly.
deploy.warning: Trading involves risk. Start with small positions and monitor performance closely.

complete.title: Setup Complete
complete.description: Your strategy setup is complete. You can now proceed to backtesting or deployment.
complete.scrollRight: Scroll to the right to see more options

direction.header: What is the trade direction for your strategy?

tradable.searchHelpDesc: You can search for tradables using keywords, field names, and advanced logic. Use 'field:value' to search specific fields (e.g., 'name:apple'). Separate multiple terms with commas or spaces. Use '{{and}}' for AND logic (all terms must match), and '{{or}}' for OR logic (at least one term matches).
tradable.searchHelpExample1: AAPL, ETF (matches any tradable with 'AAPL' or 'ETF' in any field)
tradable.searchHelpExample2: name:apple, sector:tech (matches tradables with 'apple' in the name and 'tech' in the sector)
tradable.searchHelpAndDesc: Type words separated by spaces to require all terms to match (AND logic).
tradable.searchHelpOrDesc: Use commas or 'or' to match any term (OR logic).
tradable.searchHelpFieldDesc: Use field:value to search in a specific field.

execution.header: If a trade setup is detected:

orders.marginWarning: Using Margin to leverage investments carries high risk and is not recommended
orders.orderTypeLabel: How should this order be placed?
orders.brokerAccountInfo: Account size will be retrieved from your brokerage
orders.enforcedForMVP: This is enforced and cannot be changed for MVP

orderTypeInfo.title: Order Type
orderTypeInfo.description: Order types determine how your trades are executed. Market orders fill immediately at the best available price. Limit orders let you set a specific price, but may not fill if the market doesn't reach it. Choose the type that fits your strategy and risk tolerance.

setup.distanceTitle: Distance if a Trade Setup is Detected
setup.distanceDesc: Set how far in advance you want to be notified of potential trade setups
setup.chooseAccountDesc: Select the account you want to use for this strategy
setup.backtestDesc: Test your strategy against historical data to validate its performance
setup.deployDesc: Launch your strategy to start trading in live markets
setup.scrollRight: Scroll to the right to see more options
setup.completeDesc: Your strategy setup is complete. You can now proceed to backtesting or deployment.

exposure.title: Exposure Management
exposure.desc: Configure how much of your account to risk per trade or allocate per asset
exposure.description: Configure how much of your account to risk per trade or allocate per asset

popups.strategyLimitsDesc: Set limits to control risk and manage your strategy's behavior
popups.riskPerTradeLabel: How much of your account do you want to risk per trade?
popups.allocationPerStockLabel: How much of your account should be allocated per qualifying stock?
popups.tradeLimitsHint: Max open trades: 1 per stock, 5 total

editModal.title: Edit Strategy
editModal.warning: Editing this strategy will reset its backtest history and performance metrics. Are you sure you want to continue?

duplicateModal.title: Duplicate Strategy
duplicateModal.message: This will create a copy of the strategy. The duplicate will be set to DRAFT status.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Strategy
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this strategy? This action cannot be undone.
